lead_paragraph: The U.S. Supreme Court on Monday refused to hear an appeal by a Jamaican pimp who styled himself as Dracula, even wearing gold-plated fangs, concerning his objection to being ordered to pay restitution to a woman he forced into prostitution in her native Australia.

headline.main: U.N. Nuclear Chief Says Confident of U.S. Cooperation on Iran Deal
